name: SecOnDay
description:
Journal entry: the subject is placed in a time loop generator. Can he get out of the loop without endangering the world? 
-Dock B. Mad

First person logic game. Made for "Ludum Dare 51"!!!

Use arrows or WASD (Move) and Mouse (Left Click - Action, use on objects)
Spacebar - Jump

Game by Vladimir Frolov (Volkolak), Vasiliy Fokin (Bassilij)

If you find some bugs or have any questions please contact us at:
